trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event and for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"> </xref> 이벤트 및에 대 한는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: By default: - In the session authentication module (SAM) the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method after a session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) has been created.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로:-세션 인증 모듈 (SAM)는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>내에서 이벤트가 발생는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>호출한 후 세션 토큰 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) 만들어졌습니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>

trans-unit.source: This happens, for example, if an event handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event modifies the token.
trans-unit.target: 이런 경우 예를 들어 경우에 대 한 이벤트 처리기는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>이벤트 토큰을 수정 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: You can use the SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs to modify the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user).
trans-unit.target: 파이프라인을 통해 더 이상 전달 하 고 (사용자) 요청을 만드는 엔터티를 인증 하는 데 사용 하기 전에 세션 토큰을 수정 하는 SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - In the WS-Federation authentication module (WSFAM), the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event is raised from the request processing pipeline just after a session token has been created from the WS-Federation sign-in response message received from the STS and just before the SAM is called to set the thread principal and write the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: WS-페더레이션 인증 모듈 (WSFAM) 인는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>이벤트는 SAM 스레드 보안 주체를 설정 하 고 세션 쿠키를 작성 하기 위해 호출 바로 전에 및 STS 로부터 받은 Ws-federation 로그인 응답 메시지에서 세션 토큰을 만든 후에 바로 요청 처리 파이프라인에서 발생 합니다.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property to modify or replace the token.
You can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A> to specify whether the session cookie should be written (or re-written).
trans-unit.target: 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A>지정 여부 세션 쿠키 해야 수 기록 (또는 다시 작성).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified session security token.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs"> </xref> 지정한 세션 보안 토큰을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `sessionToken` parameter.
The session security token that was created.
Gets or sets the session security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: 생성 된 세션 보안 토큰을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The session token that was created.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cookie should be written in the response.
trans-unit.target: 응답에서 쿠키를 쓸지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to write a cookie in the response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>응답에 쿠키를 작성 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the cookie is not written in the response.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 쿠키 응답에 기록 되지 않습니다.
